sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of International Business Machines ( IBM ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 2.3%.
Year to date, International Business Machines has lost about 7.3% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Nike ( NKE ), trading down 2.1%.
Nike is lower by about 2.2% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 2.0%, and Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading up 2.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
